5132198950738050.original: AI革命初见端倪。deepseek深度思考+联网，可以让大部分人对事物的认知上升一个层级。如果有人问我怎么样能尽快提升自己，我的答案是，去学会用DeepSeek。

5132789607301135.original:
小红书开源了其最新语音识别模型：FireRedASR，擅长识别中英文、方言/歌词，在公共普通话ASR基准测试中达到了新的最佳水平

两种架构设计，LLM版，8.3B参数，高识别准确率，支持无缝的端到端语音交互，适合高质量语音转写

AED版， 1.1B参数，可以平衡性能和效率，适合普通应用场景

github： ...全文
5132789607301135.processed:
Xiaohongshu has open-sourced its latest speech recognition model: FireRedASR, which is good at recognizing Chinese and English, dialects/lyrics, achieving a new best level in the public Mandarin ASR benchmark test.

There are two architecture designs, LLM version with 8.3B parameters, high recognition accuracy, supporting seamless end-to-end voice interaction, suitable for high-quality voice transcription.

AED version with 1.1B parameters, can balance performance and efficiency, suitable for general application scenarios.

github: ... github： ...
5132789607301135.refined_with_url: Xiaohongshu has open-sourced its latest speech recognition model: FireRedASR, which is good at recognizing Chinese and English, dialects/lyrics, achieving a new best level in the public Mandarin ASR benchmark test. There are two architecture designs, LLM version with 8.3B parameters, high recognition accuracy, supporting seamless end-to-end voice interaction, suitable for high-quality voice transcription. AED version with 1.1B parameters, can balance performance and efficiency, suitable for general application scenarios. GitHub: /status/5132789607301135

支持流式响应、服务器端操作、响应式设计
支持实时上下文检索、保存聊天记录
可定制UI组件

5132449099808896.processed:
A React component for building AI chat assistants with RAG support: rag-chat-component, which can quickly add an intelligent chat assistant to Next.js applications.

Supports streaming responses, server-side operations, and responsive design.
Supports real-time context retrieval and chat log saving.
Customizable UI component.

GitHub:

5132449099808896.refined_with_url:
A React component for building AI chat assistants with RAG support: rag-chat-component, which can quickly add an intelligent chat assistant to Next.js applications.

5132823910944683.original: 传闻 Anthropic 本周会发布 Claude 4，也是类似于 DeepSeek R1 的推理模型，据说评分超过 OpenAI 的 o3，并且他们也要上线 AI 编程智能体。
5132823910944683.processed: Rumor has it that Anthropic will release Claude 4 this week, which is an inference model similar to DeepSeek R1, and it's said to score higher than OpenAI's o3. They are also going to launch AI programming agents.

5132917726512129.original:
英伟达的一款PDF转AI播客的工具：pdf-to-podcast

可以指定重点，比如生成音频的时候重点关注这篇文章里的某个部分

支持多种音频格式。可以生成两个人对话，也可以是一人独白，默认两人

github：网页链接

#ai创造营##AI播客##PDF转播客##pdftopodcast#
5132917726512129.processed: NVIDIA has a tool for converting PDFs to AI podcasts: pdf-to-podcast. You can specify important parts to focus on when generating the audio, such as a specific section of the article. It supports multiple audio formats. It can generate a conversation between two people or a monologue by one person, with two people as the default. Github link: https://github.com/NVIDIA-AI-Blueprints/pdf-to-podcast
5132917726512129.refined_with_url: NVIDIA has a tool for converting PDFs to AI podcasts: pdf-to-podcast. You can specify important parts to focus on when generating the audio, such as a specific section of the article. It supports multiple audio formats. It can generate a conversation between two people or a monologue by one person, with two people as the default. Github link: https://github.com/NVIDIA-AI-Blueprints/pdf-to-podcast

5133378145490685.original: Sam Altman 说会为 ChatGPT Plus 用户提供每月 10 次使用 Deep Research 的机会，而免费用户每月可使用 2 次，计划随着时间的推移逐步增加。未来需要找到一种更灵活的方式，让用户可以根据需求动态支付计算资源的费用。
5133378145490685.processed: Sam Altman said ChatGPT Plus users will be given 10 opportunities per month to use Deep Research, while free users can use it twice per month, with plans to gradually increase over time. In the future, a more flexible way needs to be found for users to dynamically pay for computing resources according to their needs.
5133378145490685.refined_with_url: Sam Altman said ChatGPT Plus users will be given 10 opportunities per month to use Deep Research, while free users can use it twice per month, with plans to gradually increase over time. In the future, a more flexible way needs to be found for users to dynamically pay for computing resources according to their needs.
